title: Pbe Client Problem
body: Whenever I go to start the pbe I have to download and update the whole game every time. Is there a way to fix that?

replies.body: The PBE is constantly changing, and it's possible to experience frequent updates for testing purposes.  Depending on your computer, it may take some time for the files to update.  As Ventura provided, please feel free to share any feedback you have with PBE on the PBE boards.

This is an issue you'd probably want to post on the PBE specific boards:

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/
